name: Hyper Danganronpa H2O: Complete Edition
description:
Based on the Danganronpa series of murder mystery visual novels, Hyper! Danganronpa H2O is an original fangame set in a new location with it's own cast!

16 teenagers find themselves trapped in the underwater basement of Freedom Academy, a school for Super High School Level Students that excel in their individual fields. They are told that the only way to escape is to participate in a deadly game where the victor is set free, and the losers face fatal defeat.

Hyper! Danganronpa H2O Complete Edition contains every episode in the series, as well as plenty of new content for the FIRST English language Danganronpa fangame to be finished in it's entirety! It is split into two discs.

Disc A contains the original 12 episodes, from the Prologue to Episode 11. This is the original game that was released over the course of about a year.

Disc B contains all the new bonus content such as:
-Bonus Mode Beta, a mode taking place in an alternate universe where the cast are all able to attend school like normal, and have normal lives. This mode is incomplete, but still has plenty of content for players to enjoy.
-The Extended Epilogues, which take place 5 years after the game ends, and focuses on where the survivors are now. It is written entirely in prose, with no new art.
-The Art of Hyper Danganronpa H2O, an artbook with every CG and piece of official art, including some that hasn't been posted anywhere else. the book also includes commentary on the development of the game, and what the experience was like.
